content.p: The Colenso UNM Travel Fund was established by Dr Michèle Colenso, an alumnus of the University of Nottingham from 1984. This fund will support applications from UNM students to undertake international travel as part of their studies or extra-curricular activities where international travel will offer them an opportunity to broaden their horizons. The application will be invited twice annually in Spring and Autumn and provides RM17,000 for each intake. We enclosed the Guiding Document Application Form Agreement Feedback Form Applications should be submitted before midnight on the following dates and will be reviewed within two weeks of receipt. Closing Date : Tuesday, 3 March 2020 Note: The Travel Approver (Section 4 in the Application Form) is responsible for the budget and execution of the project. If you are seeking Travel Approval from SA’s Office please ensure that application form is submitted one week before deadline for SA Manager to review and approve. We look forward to your application. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8373 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8657 email: alumnirelations@nottingham.edu.my
